resp = client.indices.create(
    index="retrievers_example_nested",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "nested_field": {
                "type": "nested",
                "properties": {
                    "paragraph_id": {
                        "type": "keyword"
                    },
                    "nested_vector": {
                        "type": "dense_vector",
                        "dims": 3,
                        "similarity": "l2_norm",
                        "index": True
                    }
                }
            },
            "topic": {
                "type": "keyword"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
